title: Adobe CS4 & Multiple Licenses
content:
As you probably already know, Adobe is unleashing the [CS4](http://web.archive.org/web/20090620070321/http:/www.adobe.com/products/creativesuite/) soon. The upgrade price tag is not a pleasant surprise, almost 900€, and the price for a regular Design Premium Pack more than 2.638€.

My question is, is anyone into the multiple licenses on Adobe products? Any drastic price discount over the normal licenses?
author: adriano

comments.content: The discount price on volume licensing depends upon the number of licenses you buy — the greater the number, the higher the discount.
Yes, but I can’t find that price table anywhere. Anyone?
